 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוּב‎</span>] **verb** ==be guilty== (Late Hebrew ***id., be under obligation, guilty***; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוּב‎</span>, ***be defeated, guilty***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be disappointed, fail***; — Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***sin***, is loan-word according to [[BDB#Bev|Bev]] [[Dan.1.10|Dan 1:10]]); — 

**Qal** not in MT; but read perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַבְתִּי‎</span> (for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַבֹּתִי‎</span>) [[1Sam.22.22|1Sam 22:22]] ***I am guilty***, so [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]. **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** ***inculpate*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְחִיַּבְתֶּם אתרֿאֹשִׁי לַמֶּ֑לֶךְ‎</span> consecutive [[Dan.1.10|Dan 1:10]] ***and inculpate my head with the king***.
